review: Overall this is a wonderful product that works as advertised straight from the box. Setup is easy. However, there are two big design flaws that require documenting.1. Terrible remote battery latch/slide.As a woman with a muscle disability, I couldn't pry the back of the remote off to get the batteries in - not even with a knife! In fact, I ended up having to wait 24 hours for someone to help me get it off with a tiny screwdriver. At first, I chalked this up to a personal problem but I googled and see that even physically healthy adults are reporting problems with this.2. Short power cable.The power cable from the stick to the outlet is only about two-three feet, which is troublesome on my wall mounted TV. If it was any higher I would have had to buy a replacement cord.Since setup, however, I have enjoyed watching a number of streaming services on the Fire Stick. It's still a wonderful product, it could just use some better physical design.
